name: spacebar
description: SpacebarChat is a self-hosted chat platform inspired by Discord and Revolt. It features channels, roles, voice, and federation-ready protocols in a modern web UI.
features: Text and voice chat: Provides channels for text messaging and voice communication.
Server organization: Creates servers with channels, categories, and roles.
Role management: Assigns permissions and access levels with custom roles.
Direct messaging: Sends private messages to individuals or groups.
File sharing: Uploads and shares files, images, and videos in channels.
Emoji and reactions: Uses custom emojis and reacts to messages.
Voice channels: Joins voice channels for group audio communication.
Screen sharing: Shares screen during voice calls for collaboration.
Bot support: Integrates bots for moderation and custom functionality.
Markdown formatting: Formats messages with markdown syntax.
Notification system: Customizes notification settings per channel or server.
Federation ready: Designed with federation protocols for future interoperability.
